column1: This article presents an extended case analysis involving the impact of infidelity on an intimate relationship where the emotional connection between the two partners runs very deep but where the involved partner's multiple infidelities and the hurt partner's wounded and defended heart keep them stuck, the couple neither being able to end the relationship nor heal from the emotional trauma to the relationship.
